ComicInfo.Series: Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween Tales III
ComicInfo.Summary:
It's back...the annual Halloween event of the year! Return to Honey Island Swamp with three new tales of All Hallows' Eve! Blood flows and bodies rot in the swamp. And the tortured spirit of Victor Crowley continues to dole out brutal violent retribution upon those that dare to enter his domain. This time of year the spirits of the dead are close and they return from Purgatory to try to take back some measure of vengeance! Join a host of horror writers and artists as we deliver a dose of glorious over-the-top horror that will get your Halloween off to a great start! Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween III comes with three cover editions - Main "The Dead Rise" by Roy Allan Martinez (Zorro Swords of Hell), "Jack's Back" Variant by Richard Bonk (Hatchet), and "Don't Lose Your Head" cover by Puis Calzada (Hatchet).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover (The Dead Rise) | Roy Allan Martinez | 1 | B | Variant Cover (Jack's Back) | Richard Bonk | 2 | C | Variant Cover (Don't Lose Your Head) | Puis Calzada | 3 | D | Homage Variant Cover | Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-17 21:58:02. [CVDB891690]
ComicInfo.Writer: James Kuhoric, Mike Federalli, S.A. Check
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alexander Banchitta, Elmer V. Cantada, Puis Calzada, Alexander Banchitta, Elmer V. Cantada, Puis Calzada
ComicInfo.Inker: Alexander Banchitta, Elmer V. Cantada, Puis Calzada, Alexander Banchitta, Elmer V. Cantada, Puis Calzada
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Buz Hasson, Ken Haeser, Puis Calzada, Richard Bonk, Roy Allan Martinez
